snippet: While this show doesn’t include “Studio Visit” (2005), in which Mr. Sola invited curators to his studio, then jumped out the window, it offers a glimpse of his Weltanschauung.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit of works by artist Joe Sola at Blackston gallery.
lead_paragraph: While this show doesn’t include “Studio Visit” (2005), in which Mr. Sola invited curators to his studio, then jumped out the window, it offers a glimpse of his Weltanschauung.

headline.print_headline: Joe Sola: ‘American Sex Room and other Works’
headline.main: Joe Sola: ‘American Sex Room and other Works’
